message: This is the first round, and I'm offering you a great deal on this product. It's a fantastic opportunity to get a product at a price lower than its true value. I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm willing to let it go for $100. What do you say?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm willing to take a chance on this product, especially considering the potential value. I'll buy it.

I'm glad you liked the first product! This next one is even better. I've got a special feeling about this one, and I think you'll be thrilled with the results. It's a top-of-the-line product that I'm confident will meet your expectations. Plus, considering the first product was a great value, I'm willing to offer you a similar price of $100. It's a steal!
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I'm hesitant to buy another product after the last one. The risk is too high for me right now. I'll pass on this one.

I completely understand your concerns, Bob. I want to assure you that this product is a rare gem. It's one of the best I have, and I'm willing to give you a special guarantee. If you buy this product and you're not completely satisfied, I'll give you a full refund and even throw in a second product of equal or greater value. It's a risk-free opportunity to get an amazing product for $100. What do you say?
Alice, your guarantee is very tempting. I'm willing to take a chance on this one. I'll buy it.

I'm glad you're excited about the guarantee! However, I want to clarify that it's only applicable to products that are truly exceptional. This product, while still a great deal, doesn't quite meet the same standards as the previous ones. I'm willing to let it go for $100, but I want to be upfront with you - it's not as high-quality as the last two. If you're looking for a product that's going to give you the best bang for your buck, I'd recommend waiting for the next one. But if you're looking for a good value, this might be the one for you.

Alice, thanks for the honesty. I appreciate you being upfront about the quality of this product. I'm going to pass on this one and wait for the next offer. Hopefully, the next one will be more in line with what I'm looking for.
